command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/2/a/d/dataset_2ad787a9-2083-4145-8593-16b90dd28f85.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&            bcftools view     --samples 'NA00002'     --min-ac 1 --max-ac 1 --types "snps"            --regions-overlap 1          --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/0/c/8/dataset_0c86100c-0640-493b-9cc3-1b2080b9b4cc.dat'
